title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Custom question benchmark mapping
description:
Viva Glint survey creators will be able to associate custom questions with standard Viva Glint questions to utilize benchmark comparisons in the reporting UI. 

This feature allows survey creators to tailor standard questions to better fit their needs while still benefiting from benchmark data. 

For example, the standard question might be: 
"How happy are you working at {{company name}}?" 

You can create and map multiple similar questions to this standard question, such as: 
- "How happy are you working at {{company name}} this quarter?" 
- "How happy are you working at {{company name}} this year?" 

By doing so, you can leverage benchmark comparisons for custom questions, ensuring you get the most relevant insights.
